name: sayapp
description: Write a function to return the natural language pronunciation (string representation) for integers ranging from 0 to 999,999,999,999,999,999. ​ Examples: 0 => zero 1 => one 11 => eleven 21 => twenty-one 101 => one hundred and one 115 => one hundred fifteen 221 => two hundred twenty-one 1005 => one thousand and five 184 => one hundred eighty-four 21235 => twenty-one thousand two hundred thirty-five 1_000_001 => one million and one ​ Limit thousands groups to million, billion, trillion. ​ Any values outside the given integers range and invalid types will cause an exception to be thrown.
